title: 820-4924 no trackpad or keyboard
message:
Hi there,

Could you please help with solving no trackpad or keyboard problem on this motherboard.

Power button works because mac responds to ON/OFF and SMC reset but cant type or use trackpad.

PP3V42_G3H is present on J4813.

R4823 and R4823 are good 2k. Also these two lines are okay.

Please advice how to proceed.

Thanks,
Max

title: 820-4924 no trackpad or keyboard
message: Tried known good trackpad flex? 110% most common issue on this model.

title: 820-4924 no trackpad or keyboard
message: Did I test it with a new cable - of course I did! Was it a good one? Hmmm probably not since after testing it with a third cable everything works now. Hahaha joke is on me. Thanks for your help. I go shame in the corner now :)

title: 820-4924 no trackpad or keyboard
message: Lmao all good 4924 first thing to always try is the cable.
